titleStmt.title: Edward T. Sturgeon to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2853

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
Louisville July 28. 1862
Gov. B. Magoffin
Dear Sir

Will you be kind enough to send me the necessary papers for Mr Henry Cluskey of Saint Louis Missouri to act as Commissioner for Kentucky in that state for taking acknowledgment of deeds &c.. Any fees that may attach to the papers I will send you as soon as I know the amount

Missouri
Comr. of Deeds
City
Henry Cluskey
Issd July 30. 1862
